name: IWP
description:
Whether you want the simplest packaging or the most sophisticated trade & consumer marketing campaigns, we bring plenty to the table. We have many years of food and drink industry expertise at national and international levels, understanding the ebb and flow of trends and the direct impact of poor marketing and advertising on your brands. We know what works. And just as importantly, we know what doesn't work. Food and drink is OUR food and drink.
We're good at it and we've helped some of the biggest names in the business get even bigger, by developing highly successful consumer and trade campaigns for segments including frozen food, chocolate, pet food, wine and FMCG.
